english.segment1: Forgive me if I stare. But I am taken back. That You would let me here. Regardless of my past. Oh my hands are shaking now. But I catch my breathe somehow. Oh, I am free at last
english.segment2: Unaware of my fears. Unaware of my shame. Nothing else matters here. But glorifying Your name. Unaware of everything. Knowing You're aware of me
english.segment3: Tell me how I got here. I couldn't make it on my own. Just tell me I can stay. Cause it feels so much like home. And I lose all track of time. When I look into Your eyes. Your love is all I know
english.segment4: Unaware of my fears. Unaware of my shame. Nothing else matters here. But glorifying Your name. Unaware of everything. Knowing You're aware of me
english.segment5: I'm aware I'm in a place I couldn't be. If You weren't there to call my name and rescue me
english.segment6: Unaware of my fears. Unaware of my shame. Nothing else matters here. But glorifying Your name
english.segment7: I'm unaware of all my fears. And I'm unaware of all my shame. Nothing else matters here. But glorifying Your name
english.segment8: I'm unaware that I still breathe. Unaware of everything. Knowing You're aware of me
